mng: clown, 2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox, ancient Chinese compass point: 30°

exm.mng: shameful, scandalous, to be humiliated, to make a fool of sb or oneself, to make sb lose face
to defame, to libel, to defile, to smear, to vilify
twenty sixth year F2 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2009 or 2069
family scandal, skeleton in the closet
